#Script to count SNPs and generate genotype data.

== Summary ==

This python script sum the occurrence of [ATCG|atcg] or [,.] for each scaffold, and also convert count result to genotype table and the genotype table can be cleaned if the option is 1.


== Details ==

=== Parameters ===
  * Input mpileup file
  * number of samples
  * option: cleaned (1) or not cleaned(0)
    * if set to 1 , this script removes SNPs with obvious artifacts (low efficiency, very skewed genotype ratio, etc.),and two extra files will be generated: one with the genotype counts per SNP (“GTcounts_” to aid the QC of the data) and one a new genotype table from which the artifactual SNPs have been removed ( “cleanedGTs_”).  

=== Sample Command ===
{{{
$ python 02-GenotyperCleaner.py  test20k.mp 3 1
 
}}}

=== Input and Output ===

  * Input file: -- mpileup file: [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/test20k.mp test20k.mp]

  * Output file1: -- parsed file with SNP counts: [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/parsed_test20k.tsv parsed_test20k.tsv]

  * Output file2: -- genotype file: [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/genotyped_test20k.tsv genotyped_test20k.tsv]  
 
  * Output file3: -- cleaned genotype file(removes SNPs with obvious artifacts ): [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/cleanedGTs_test20k.tsv cleanedGTs_test20k.tsv]  

  * Output file4: -- genotype count file(genotype counts for SNP): [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/GTcounts_test20k.tsv GTcounts_test20k.tsv]
